[[inst_bstart_par]]
==== BSTART.PAR

*Syntax:* BSTART.PAR TileOp10, DataType

*Description:* Block Start: marks the beginning of a template block with execution hint.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_bstart_par.svg[BSTART.PAR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* CMD/BLOCK_SPLIT
